thread.title: Lady Gaga Gets a Stylish Head Start on Her Super Bowl Halftime Performance
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga Gets a Stylish Head Start on Her Super Bowl Halftime Performance

author: Edward Barsamian
title: Lady Gaga Gets a Stylish Head Start on Her Super Bowl Halftime Performance
text:
Lady Gaga Gets a Stylish Head Start on Her Super Bowl Halftime Performance January 10, 2017 5:15 pm Expand Photo: AKM-GSI 
Lady Gaga is one of fashion’s most rarefied chameleons. She can go from couture cowgirl to Parisian-inspired princess at the drop of her very pink hat. And judging by the look she wore to Bradley Cooper’s home in Los Angeles yesterday, it appears that Gaga might prepping for her next big transformation. The Joanne singer is slated to perform at this year’s Super Bowl halftime show, and has scored something of a sartorial touchdown with her new football-shaped handbag. 
Aside from that eye-catching trophy piece, the singer kept things low-key, overall. A sweater with epaulette-like detailing and skinny jeans were a subtle nod to a football uniform, with chunky-heeled boots in place of cleats. Though it’s fair to say that in this case the bag really took the prize.
